videos.title: The Day of Atonement & the Cleansing of the Sanctuary (Bible Study)
videos.description: In this Bible study, we break down the Day of Atonement and the cleansing of the sanctuaryâ€”why God established it, what it reveals about sin and atonement, and how it connects to the judgment and the opening of the books. We walk through the sanctuary pattern, why atonement requires blood and a High Priest, and how Scripture shows judgment for the living and the dead.

videos.title: Daniel 8: Pagan Rome to Papal Rome & The Dark Ages
videos.description: In this powerful continuation, we answer the question everyone asks: Is Antiochus Epiphanes the Antichrist? The Bible and history say, NO. Join our 5-person Bible study as we trace Rome through BOTH its phases (pagan and papal) and see how Scripture predicted it thousands of years in advance.

videos.title: The Little Horn Power EXPOSED | Bible Prophecy Explained
videos.description: Who is the Little Horn in Daniel 8 and why do so many get it wrong? In this deep-dive Bible study, we examine Daniel's vision and prove why Antiochus Epiphanes is not the fulfillment.

videos.title: The Stone is Coming: An Overview of Daniel 2 & The 2300 Day Prophecy
videos.description: In this foundational study, we explore why God gave prophecy and break down Daniel 2's timeline, introducing the foundation for understanding the 2300-day prophecy.

videos.title: Revealing the Man of Sin: A Closer View of Daniel 7 & The 2300 Day Prophecy
videos.description: In this episode, we continue our 2300-day prophecy series by examining Daniel 7 and revealing the identifying marks of the little horn power.

videos.title: Daniel 8: Christ Our Rock & The 2300 Day Prophecy
videos.description: Join us as we continue our 2300-day prophecy series with an in-depth study of Daniel 8, revealing Christ as our Rock and foundation.

videos.title: Special In Person Episode: Why is Bible Prophecy Important?
videos.description: A special in-person episode exploring the importance of Bible prophecy and why understanding it matters for believers today.

videos.title: The Beginning of the 2300-Day Prophecy Explained Pt. 2
videos.description: Part 2 of our study on the beginning of the 2300-day prophecy, continuing to unlock the prophetic timeline of Daniel.

videos.title: The Beginning of the 2300-Day Prophecy Explained
videos.description: In today's episode, we cover the first 69 weeks of the 2300-day prophecy and examine its incredible accuracy and fulfillment.

videos.title: The 70 Week Prophecy: What You Must Know First
videos.description: The 70 weeks of Daniel 9 explained. A crucial foundation for understanding the 2300-day prophecy.

videos.title: The Call to Holiness: Put on Jesus Christ
videos.description: In this episode of ID'ing Christ, we explore the nature of God as the Holy One and the role of holiness in the life of the believer.

videos.title: Why is Jesus Called I AM?
videos.description: In the continuation of our series, 'ID'ing Christ', we explore the connection between Jesus Christ and the I AM of the Old Testament.

videos.title: Is Jesus in the Old Testament? (Part 2)
videos.description: Join us as we continue to explore the question, 'Is Jesus Christ in the Old Testament?' Discover more evidence of Christ throughout the Hebrew Scriptures.

series.name: Is Jesus in the Old Testament?

videos.title: Is Jesus in the Old Testament? (Part 1)
videos.description: Welcome to our first episode, where we explore the presence of Jesus in the Old Testament. Discover how Christ is revealed throughout the Hebrew Scriptures.

series.name: Is Jesus in the Old Testament?

videos.title: What is Jesus Doing Right Now? (Part 3)
videos.description: In Part 3 of our Sanctuary series, we explore the Plan of Redemption, the Spring and Fall feasts, and their prophetic significance.

series.name: What is Jesus Doing Right Now?

videos.title: What is Jesus Doing Right Now? (Part 1)
videos.description: Welcome to our Sanctuary series! In this first episode, we explore what Jesus is doing right now in the heavenly sanctuary and why this message is so important for us today.

series.name: What is Jesus Doing Right Now?

videos.title: What is Jesus Doing Right Now? (Part 2)
videos.description: In Part 2 of our Sanctuary series, we explore the vital importance of the Sanctuary message and what Christ is doing right now in the heavenly sanctuary on our behalf.
